DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect sequential multiple dose regimen cariprazine cardiac repolarization patient schizophrenia .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Cariprazine Cardiac Repolarization Patients With Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Men woman , age 18 50 , inclusive Symptoms schizophrenia schizoaffective disorder first appear minimum 1 year screen Negative pregnancy test Normal physical examination result , vital sign , clinical lab test result Axis II disorder severe enough interfere study Smoking 20 cigarette day History presence cardiovascular disorder Pregnant/breastfeeding and/or planning become pregnant/breastfeed Imminent risk injure self others cause significant property damage
